page.title: 15Kilmaurs _ Activities
page.content: The village has a busy social life. The Bowling, Snooker and Masonic Clubs are all licensed. Other activities: Drama (two shows performed each year plus charity shows), Historical Society, Burns Club, Horticultural Society, Ladies' Keep Fit, Yoga and Tennis Club. The Community Centre is used regulary for concerts, dances, whist drives, etc. The elderly are catered for in the Thursday Club and the young in two Youth Clubs, one run by the Parish Church, the other by the Community Association. Cub, Brownie and Guide Packs are also well supported. The Parish Church has an active Social Committee which through the year organises a variety of social functions. The local park is well maintained and well used. Children aged 5-9 attend "Woodcraft Folk" _ a nature walk/study/craft group.
